snippet: There are plenty of microscenes in rock. And though the mainstream has been resistant, who’s to say that one won’t break big?
abstract: Jon Caramanica says that even though mainstream rock music has been stagnant of late, that does not mean sub-genres and microscenes cannot produce innovative songs.
lead_paragraph: There are plenty of microscenes in rock. And though the mainstream has been resistant, who’s to say that one won’t break big?

headline.seo: Metal, Christian Rock, Dubstep: What’s the Next Grunge?
headline.main: Look Out, _____ Is the New Grunge!
headline.print_headline: Look Out, _____ Is the New Grunge!
